column4: Does anyone know if there is a software verision of the buttons i have on my monitor thats changes the possition and size? i try to run ubuntu with my tv as monitor but i cant see the whole interface
yeah ppl tell me to do that but i dont know what to look for, i had the same problem in windows but there i had a addon to my graphicdrivers that alowed me to manualy set the size
is your graphics card NVIDIA or ATI?
